headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Rare New Rewards for Riding the Crime Wave
content:
With the expansion of Los Santos Drug Wars, street crimes are reaching all-time highs.

Over the course of the next two weeks, contributing to this bustling ecosystem of criminality will be rewarded with rare items, accessories, and collectibles, including the Painted Tiger mask, Camo Roses Slab Cap, and more.

Complete the challenges before March 1 to qualify (clothing rewards will be delivered to your wardrobe by March 10).
